element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new layer with values that represent the number of cells in the analysis window with values lower than a given one

element.name: RADIUS
element.text: the radius of the analysis window (in cells).

element.name: VALUE
element.text: the value to search for in the analysis window. The value of the result layer represents the number of cells in the analysis window with values lower than this value.

element.name: NODATA
element.text: if this option is selected, the presence of a cell with no data value will cancel the calculation and assign the no-data value to the resulting cell . If this is not selected, cells with no data value will be ignored and the resulting value will be based only on valid data cells.
